column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A Chinese construction company CEO KT Pacific in 7Makara is accused of negligence after a steel girder fell from the site and hit a parked Camry during Pchum Ben holiday.------The incident occured at 2 pm September 28
column6: Phnom Penh.------According to the owner of the car
column7: his family had just came from a trip to the province and got out of the car to with their luggage when the metal fell and went straight through the windscreen. Luckily nobody was hurt.------*A------ similar incident------ was reported in July.------TVFB
